course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Visual Analytics for Business Decisions
course.description: This course focuses on various visualization analysis tools for business decisions. Making good use of visual analytics helps summarize and analyze large amount of data effectively. In this course, the topics like visualization framework, visual analytics for spatial, temporal, network and textual data, and dynamic visualization will be included. Reporting visualization results for business decisions will also be discussed.

reviews.author: Alice28
reviews.comment_content: The content is a bit vague and not easily to comprehend especially the course is placed in the first semester. Professor has introduced a great number of ways on how to visualize some concepts. But sometimes he may talk off the point and focus on proofing some established formula.
reviews.comment_teaching: It can be told that the professor is really skillful and know-everything, therefore if there're students raising question in the class, he will try to explain it in details and make sure everybody understands, and ... there will be delay in class dismiss for sure
reviews.comment_grading: Professor is quite generous about the grade, maybe the entire cohort did not perform well
reviews.comment_workload:
2 Assignment (group work) and 1 project, with final exam.
There are 3 questions on the final exam paper but professor did not provide any hint on the final exam, not even the question type. Therefore you need to really learn every topic in the course
